job_description:
Description: Join a purpose driven winning team, committed to results, in an inclusive and high-performing culture.

Become an integral part of a purpose-driven winning team, committed to results, and engaging in an inclusive, high-performing environment.

We are looking for a Test Automation Engineer who can design and write test automation scripts for new or existing software. If you are an experienced software test automation engineer with a development mindset and commitment towards excellence in quality - this is the position for you!

Requirements

Is this role right for you?

Utilize standard test automation frameworks to design, build and maintain programs/scripts that run automated tests on code produced by the team
Analyze and identify test scenarios to be automated
Deliver requested automation scripts in an Agile model with efficiency and accuracy ensuring automation best practices.
Continuously improve automated testing methodologies to enable QA SMEs to maximize test coverage of the full depth of enterprise product

Do you have the skills that will enable you to succeed in this role?

6+ years of experience in Test Automation using Selenium, Cypress or similar frameworks
experience with web application, API and integration test automation
Experience with Azure Test Plans is a huge advantage
Hands on experience with designing and developing a robust automation framework from scratch
Hands on experience web-based applications, and API web services
Hands on experience using tools like SOAP UI, Postman, or something similar.
Good knowledge on version control tools such as Git, Bitbucket.
Good knowledge writing SQL/NoSQL queries.
Scripting experience with any of the following technologies: Java, JavaScript, Python, etc.
Experience with Azure DevOps, JIRA, Confluence, Xray and test management tool HP ALM.
Excellent knowledge of QA processes and hands-on experience of preparing testing artifacts such as test plan, strategy, Test cases, status reports.
Well knowledge of Agile principles and the flexibility to adapt the experience to new and evolving environments
Previous experiences in the gaming industry considered as an asset
Communication skills
Ability to work as a team and independently

Benefits

Whats in it for you?

Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Ally ship - We strive to create an inclusive culture where every employee is empowered to reach their fullest potential, respected for who they are, and are embraced through bias-free practices and inclusive values across Blazesoft.
Upskilling through online courses, cross-functional development opportunities, and tuition assistance.
